alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:16AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Prowers and east central Bent Counties through 200 AM MDT... At 115 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Hasty, or 19 miles southwest of Lamar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
